stem: Which one of the following is not a risk factor for developing osteoporosis?
disc:
Low body mass (in contrast with obesity) is associated with a higher risk of osteoporosis.

Other risk factors include:
- Family history
- Female sex
- Increasing age
- Deficient diet
- Sedentary lifestyle
- Smoking
- Premature menopause
- Low body weight
- Caucasians and Asians
